question: Which of the following is a digital initiative undertaken for providing hassle free service to consumers applying for new LPG connection?
explanation: “SAHAJ” is a digital initiative undertaken for providing a hassle-free experience to consumers applying for new LPG connection. The Oil Marketing Companies have launched the facility of the release of LPG connection with online payment and issuance of “e-SV” or electronic subscription voucher which has details of number of cylinders and pressure regulators loaned to consumers against the security deposit. This document is emailed to the customer upon release of LPG connection online.
